author: wslyvh
content:
Hi, I've been working on a proposal to standardize a `txpool` API for execution clients. Not sure what's the best way to approach this.  Should I submit it as a PR on the execution-apis repo?

https://notes.ethereum.org/@wslyvh/txpool-api

author: wslyvh
content: I did speak with a few devs at different execution clients, but open to feedback!

author: mariohavel
content: I would go to <@543900561460822016> with this question, if you haven't talk to him yet ðŸ™‚

author: isamjay
content:
Hey, 
I was working on my own indexer for validator profiling. I keep hitting the API rate limiting number which is a blocker for me. Do we have an archive Geth node without a rate-limiting factor? I have a few potential solutions but they will cause delays.
<@686695036733227017> could you help me here or point to the right person ? Thanks!

author: mariohavel
content: What RPC namespace are you using? If you don't need anything geth specific, I am running Erigon archive node, fully available at `https://bordel.xyz`

author: isamjay
content: I will mostly be using the `eth` namespace. Specifically `eth_getTransactionByHash`& `eth_getLogs` . I checked with curl it seems to be working.

author: mariohavel
content: Great, let me know if you have any issues
